# Problem
You throw a dice 100 times, if it is 1 or 2, you go one station in opposite direction(=station-1).If it is 3,4 or 5 you go one station in forward direction(=station+1).If you throw a 6, you'll have to throw the die again and will go ahead the stations equal to the resulting number.
* Can't go less than station=0
* 0.1% chance of falling down from the train and come to starting point(=0)

you bet with your friend, that you'll reach minimum 30 stations.
**What is the chance that you'll win this bet?**
